text: Nothing’s growing roster of smartphones and earbuds has continued to be impressive, and even the company’s more wallet-friendly options have been pretty good especially considering their price. As such, the Nothing Ear (a) wireless earbuds are currently on sale, going for less than a hundred bucks. The Nothing Ear (a) features a more playfully-inspired design with a yellow colorway, and includes a smaller charging case as well. It does come with a lot of basic features including ANC, and can even charge for ten minutes to deliver up to ten hours of music playback (with case and ANC turned off). html:
Nothing’s growing roster of smartphones and earbuds has continued to be impressive, and even the company’s more wallet-friendly options have been pretty good especially considering their price. As such, the Nothing Ear (a) wireless earbuds are currently on sale, going for less than a hundred bucks.

The Nothing Ear (a) features a more playfully-inspired design with a yellow colorway, and includes a smaller charging case as well. It does come with a lot of basic features including ANC, and can even charge for ten minutes to deliver up to ten hours of music playback (with case and ANC turned off). You can check them out using the link below.
